b:if.cond: data:view.isSingleItem or data:view.isArchive or data:view.isLabelSearch or data:view.search.query

div.class: relative py-05 fs-08 flex ai-c g-05 mb-1
box-author flex g-1 p-1 br-05 mt-1-05

a.class: color-inherit fs-09 bold flex g-05 ai-c

div.class: flex wrap jc-c g-1 py-05 w-full mb-1

b:if.cond: not(data:posts any (p => p.labels any (l => l.name in ["Novel","Manga","Anime"])))
data:posts any (p => p.labels any (l => l.name in ["Novel","Anime","Manga"]))
data:posts any (p => p.labels any (l => l.name in ["Novel","Chapter","Anime","Manga"]))

b:with.value: data:view.isHomepage ? data:posts filter (post => post.id not in data:featuredPostIds) : data:posts

b:loop.values: data:view.isMultipleItems ? data:posts where (p => p.labels none (l => l.name in ["Template","Hidden"])) : data:posts

b:if.cond: not(data:posts any (p => p.labels any (l => l.name in ["Chapter","Episode"])))
not(data:posts any (p => p.labels any (l => l.name in ["Advertorial","Sponsor"])))

span.class: bottom-comment pointer flex relative btn-secondary g-05 ai-c mt-2 w-fill jc-c py-1

b:if.cond: not(data:posts any (p => p.labels any (l => l.name in ["Chapter","Episode"]))) and data:view.isSingleItem

a.class: profile-link g-profile flex g-05 ta-c ai-c

span.class: color-inherit fs-09 bold flex g-05 ai-c
item label-size fs-09 bold flex g-05 ai-c
